ContractItemPrice.name: ContractItemPrice
ContractItemPrice.description: Represents an object that’s used to capture a price for a product on a contract.

DiscountType.description: Type of discount to apply, which is a percentage of the price or an amount.

DiscountValue.description: Value of the discount to apply based on the discount type.

EndDate.description: End date and time of the relationship between the contract and contract item price.

ItemId.description: ID of the product or product category related to a price in a contract.

LastReferencedDate.description: Timestamp when the current user last accessed this record, a record related to this record, or a list view.

LastViewedDate.description: Timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or list view. If this value is null, the user accessed this record or list view (LastReferencedDate) but didn’t view it.

Name.description: Auto-generated number assigned to the contract item price. (Read Only)

Price.description: Unit price for the product sold as part of the contract.

ProductSellingModelId.description: Product selling model for the product associated with the price.

SellingModelType.description: Selling mode type to specify whether the product is sold as a one-time sale, an evergreen subscription, or a subscription with a defined term.

StartDate.description: Start date and time of the relationship between the contract and contract item price.

CurrencyIsoCode.description: Contains the ISO code for any currency allowed by the organization. Available only if the multicurrency feature is enabled.

ContractItemPrice.accessRules: This object is available in Enterprise, Unlimited, and Developer Editions of Revenue Cloud.
